text: Carlo Della Corna (died 26 August 2018) was an Italian professional football player and manager. ==Career== Born in Monza, Della Corna played as a goalkeeper for Varese, Chieti, Udinese, Perugia, Como and Pavia. After retiring as a player he worked as a manager and coach, primarily with youth players. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Varese Calcio players Category:S.S. title: Carlo Della Corna
